mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MNGR WHERE ID = #{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT T.RNUM, T.MNGR_SEQ, T.ID, T.PASSWORD, T.PASSWORD_KEY, T.NAME, T.USE_YN, T.REG_DATE, T.UPT_DATE FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 RNUM, M.MNGR_SEQ, M.ID, M.PASSWORD, M.PASSWORD_KEY, M.NAME, M.USE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(M.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(M.UPT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') UPT_DATE FROM TB_MNGR M INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R) T LIMIT #{startPostNumber} , #{blockPostCnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MNGR WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MNGR WHERE NAME = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MNGR ( MNGR_SEQ, ID, PASSWORD, PASSWORD_KEY, NAME, USE_YN, REG_DATE )VALUES( #{mngrSeq}, #{id}, #{password}, #{passwordKey}, #{name}, #{useYn}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MNGR SET USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPT_DATE = NOW() WHERE MNGR_SEQ = #{mngrSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT T.RNUM, T.MAINTENANCE_AREA_SEQ, T.MAINTENANCE_NAME, T.REG_DATE FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 RNUM, R.MAINTENANCE_AREA_SEQ, R.MAINTENANCE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DATE FROM TB_MAINTENANCE_AREA R INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) C ORDER BY R.REG_DATE DESC) T LIMIT #{startPostNumber} , #{blockPostCnt}
SELECT MAINTENANCE_AREA_SEQ, MAINTENANCE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DATE FROM TB_MAINTENANCE_AREA WHERE MAINTENANCE_NAME = #{maintenanceName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MAINTENANCE_AREA ( MAINTENANCE_AREA_SEQ, MAINTENANCE_NAME, REG_DATE )VALUES( #{maintenanceAreaSeq}, #{maintenanceName}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_SEQ id, DATE_FORMAT(RESERVATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') start, CONCAT('[', RESERVATION_NAME,'] ',PHONE) title, 'black' color, 'white' textColor FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND (PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR RESERVATION_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))

SELECT R.RESERVATION_SEQ, DATE_FORMAT(R.RESERVATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') RESERVATION_DATE, R.RESERVATION_NAME, R.PHONE, R.CHOOSE_AREA, R.RESERVATION_CONTENT, R.USE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(R.UPT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') UPT_DATE FROM TB_RESERVATION R WHERE R.RESERVATION_SEQ = #{reservationSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RESERVATION SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE RESERVATION_SEQ = #{reservationSeq}
UPDATE TB_RESERVATION SET USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE RESERVATION_SEQ = #{reservationSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT T.RNUM, T.NOTICE_SEQ, T.THUMBNAIL_URL, T.TITLE, T.CONTENT, T.MAIN_VIEW_YN, T.REG_MNGR_ID, T.REG_MNGR_NAME, T.REG_DATE, T.UPT_MNGR_ID, T.UPT_MNGR_NAME, T.UPT_DATE FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 RNUM, R.NOTICE_SEQ, (SELECT FILE_URL FROM TB_FILE WHERE POST_SEQ = R.NOTICE_SEQ AND FILE_KIND = 'thumbnail') THUMBNAIL_URL, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, R.MAIN_VIEW_YN, R.REG_MNGR_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_MNGR WHERE ID = R.REG_MNGR_ID) REG_MNGR_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REG_DATE, R.UPT_MNGR_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_MNGR WHERE ID = R.UPT_MNGR_ID) UPT_MNGR_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(R.UPT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') UPT_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE R INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) C ORDER BY R.REG_DATE DESC) T LIMIT #{startPostNumber} , #{blockPostCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, MAIN_VIEW_YN, REG_MNGR_ID, REG_DATE, UPT_MNGR_ID, UPT_DATE )VALUES( #{noticeSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, 'N', #{regMngrId}, NOW(), #{regMngrId}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_SEQ, POST_SEQ, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, EXTENSION_NAME, FILE_SIZE, SAVE_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_PATH, FILE_URL, FILE_KIND, REG_ID, REG_DATE )VALUES( #{fileSeq}, #{postSeq}, #{originFileName}, #{extensionName}, #{fileSize}, #{saveFileName}, #{saveFilePath}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileKind}, #{regId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, MAIN_VIEW_YN, REG_MNGR_ID, REG_DATE, UPT_MNGR_ID, UPT_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}

SELECT FILE_SEQ, POST_SEQ, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, EXTENSION_NAME, FILE_SIZE, SAVE_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_PATH, FILE_URL, FILE_KIND, REG_ID, REG_DATE FROM TB_FILE WHERE POST_SEQ = #{noticeSeq} AND FILE_KIND = 'thumbnail'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPT_MNGR_ID = #{uptMngrId}, UPT_DATE = NOW() WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
